name: IITG Study Groups
tagline: Android application for IITG Students to create study groups
body:
### The Idea
This application has been built for the students of IIT Guwahati so that they can create their own study groups and find other people with the same interests.

###Features
The main features include:
- A discussion forum for all groups.
- Anyone can create a new group that suits their interest.
- Anyone can join the group of their choice and read about the already discussed topics.

### Author
This application is being built and maintained by Man Parvesh Singh Randhawa (@manparvesh), based on the idea by [Rohan Gupta](https://www.facebook.com/rohanIsPanda). 

### Support or Contact
In case of any trouble, you can contact me on [Facebook](facebook.com/manparvesh) or mail me at manparveshsinghrandhawa@gmail.com
